gamedesc: A semi-idle game in which the protagonist is somehow exiled to a void universe and has to use the magical powers that are present in said universe to learn to survive.

exiled.name: Exiled
exiled.desc: You have been exiled to this void universe. You should be dead, but you are not.

thetestmonster.name: The Test Monster
thetestmonster.desc: There is a bad monster around, it's called the test monster.

spatialmagics.name: Spatial Magics
spatialmagics.desc: Your ability to stabalize the void dimension.

runicmagics.name: Runic Magics
runicmagics.desc: Your ability with the written magics.

husbandry.name: Husbandry
husbandry.desc: Your ability to harvest produce from live animals.

butchering.name: Butchering
butchering.desc: The ability to kill animals and harvest their flesh.

skinning.name: Skinning
skinning.desc: Getting skins and hides from dead animals.
